mapper.select: select id, corp_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, notification_related_type, notification_related_id, notification_is_read, notification_receive_at, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_corp_notification where corp_id = #{corpId} order by created_datetime desc
select count(*) from tbl_corp_notification where corp_id = #{corpId} and notification_is_read = false
mapper.update: update tbl_corp_notification set notification_is_read = true, updated_datetime = current_timestamp where corp_id = #{corpId} and notification_is_read = false
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_corp_notification (corp_id, notification_type, notification_title, notification_content, notification_related_id) values (#{corpId}, #{notificationType}, #{notificationTitle}, #{notificationContent}, #{notificationRelatedId})
mapper.select: select count(*) > 0 from tbl_corp where id = #{corpId}
